scripts.test: npm run master & npm run slaves
scripts.build:slave: npm run clean && mkdir -p public && ncp app/videos public/videos && jade -O "{basedir:'app/templates'}" -P -o public app/templates/index.jade && webpack --colors --profile --display-error-details --config webpack.config.babel.js
scripts.watch:slave: npm run clean && mkdir -p public && ncp app/videos public/videos && jade -O "{basedir:'app/templates'}" -P -o public app/templates/index.jade -w --no-debug
scripts.slaves: npm run watch:slave & npm run slave-1 & npm run slave-2 & npm run slave-3 & npm run slave-4
